hero.title: Your Transformation, Guided with LumeCare.
hero.description: Discover world-class aesthetic results with the confidence of dedicated, personal support. LumeCare is your trusted partner for a safe and empowering medical journey in Cali, Colombia.

about.heading: More Than an Agency. We're Your Partners in Transformation.

cards.title: Security First, Always.
cards.text: Your health is non-negotiable. We meticulously vet every credential and protocol to ensure your absolute safety.

cards.title: Unwavering Trust.
cards.text: We build relationships on radical honesty and open communication, from your first chat to your follow-up.

cards.title: True Empowerment.
cards.text: We provide clear, comprehensive information, giving you the power to make confident decisions about your body.

cards.title: Absolute Transparency.
cards.text: No hidden fees. No surprises. We provide detailed, all-inclusive quotes so you know exactly what to expect.

about.missionIntro: LumeCare wasn't created to be just another service. It was born from a deeply personal purpose: to make the dream of aesthetic transformation a reality that is safe, human, and truly empowering.
about.missionText: By building exclusive partnerships with board-certified specialists in Cali and dedicating ourselves to warm, personal support, we uphold an unwavering commitment to ethics, health, and your authentic beauty.

steps.title: The Consultation
steps.description: This is the beginning of our partnership. It starts with a warm, confidential conversation where we listen intently to your aspirations. We don't just hear you; we understand you. You'll finish this phase feeling heard, safe, and excited for what's to come.

steps.title: The Blueprint
steps.description: Clarity is kindness. You will receive a meticulously detailed, all-inclusive plan that serves as your personal blueprint. It outlines everything—from procedure details to transparent pricing. We handle the complexities so you can approve your plan with absolute confidence.

steps.title: The LumeCare Experience
steps.description: From the moment you land, you are under our care. Your procedure will be performed by a world-class specialist, and your recovery will be in a serene environment. Your only job is to focus on yourself. We handle the rest.

steps.title: The Lifelong Commitment
steps.description: Our partnership doesn't end when you fly home—it evolves. Through virtual follow-ups, we celebrate your results and ensure your peace of mind. You return empowered, knowing you have a dedicated partner in your beauty and wellness for life.

breast.title: Breast Procedures

reviews.text: Cali, Colombia is absolutely the best place for an aesthetic transformation. The city feels vibrant, welcoming, and the medical standards exceeded my expectations.
reviews.author: Sarah M.

reviews.text: The LumeCare team made me feel at home from the moment I arrived. Their warmth and care during my entire travel made the experience unforgettable.
reviews.author: Sophie L.

reviews.text: Everything about my treatment was perfect. The associates were attentive, professional, and truly cared about my recovery and comfort.
reviews.author: Theo R.

reviews.text: I was nervous about traveling abroad for surgery, but LumeCare’s guidance made it smooth and safe. From airport pickup to aftercare, everything was seamless.
reviews.author: Isabella S.

reviews.text: The attention to detail and personalized approach were incredible. I left Cali not only transformed physically but also emotionally renewed.
reviews.author: Michael T.
